title: Towards an Understanding of Developer Experience-Driven Transparency in Software Ecosystems
summary: Software ecosystems (SECO) have become a dominant paradigm in the software industry, enabling third-party developers to co-create value through complementary components and services. While Developer Experience (DX) is increasingly recognized as critical for sustainable SECO, transparency remains an underexplored factor shaping how developers perceive and interact with ecosystems.
